GSD.description:
staging: rtl8723bs: remove a second possible deadlock

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.5 by commit 12cfdef56c3b809c3e25dba5366f01856b734c0b. For more details please see the references link.
